name: icai-cors-proxy
description: InChambers CORS Proxy for OpenRouter - Cloudflare Worker
author: InChambers

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: **Required**: Your OpenRouter API key from [openrouter.ai/keys](https://openrouter.ai/keys). This key enables access to 11 premium AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek, Mistral).

ORGANIZATION_ID.description: **Optional**: Your organization UUID from InChambers Admin Dashboard. Prevents cross-org access attempts. Leave empty to allow multiple organizations.

ALERT_WEBHOOK_URL.description: **Optional**: Webhook URL (Slack, Discord, etc.) for security alerts (abuse detection, unauthorized access attempts).

JWT_PUBLIC_KEY_FALLBACK.description: **Optional**: RS256 public key for JWT verification fallback. Auto-fetched during deployment. Improves cold-start resilience.
